comments.description:
Additional info for staff or patron. Format: [STAFF : staff comment 
 PATRON : patron comment]

transactionInfo.description: Additional transaction information, e.g. check number

notifyPatron.description: Should send patron notification or not

servicePointId.description: Unique ID of the service point where the payment was made

userName.description: Name of the user that was logged in when the payment was made

paymentMethod.description: Name of the payment method, e.g. `Cash` or `Credit card`
